para.sentence: The function M\left(a,b,x+y\right) has the following expansions: \sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{{\left(a\right)_{n}}y^{n}}{{\left(b\right)_{n}}n!}M \left(a+n,b+n,x\right), \left(\frac{x+y}{x}\right)^{1-b}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{{\left(1-b\right)_{n} }(-\ifrac{y}{x})^{n}}{n!}M\left(a,b-n,x\right), if |y|<|x|, \left(\frac{x}{x+y}\right)^{a}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{{\left(a\right)_{n}}y^{ n}}{n!(x+y)^{n}}M\left(a+n,b,x\right), if \Re(y/x)>-\tfrac{1}{2}, e^{y}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{{\left(b-a\right)_{n}}(-y)^{n}}{{\left(b\right)_ {n}}n!}M\left(a,b+n,x\right) , e^{y}\left(\frac{x}{x+y}\right)^{b-a}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{{\left(b-a\right )_{n}}y^{n}}{n!(x+y)^{n}}\*M\left(a-n,b,x\right), if \Re((y+x)/x)>\frac{1}{2}, e^{y}\left(\frac{x+y}{x}\right)^{1-b}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{{\left(1-b\right )_{n}}(-y)^{n}}{n!x^{n}}\*M\left(a-n,b-n,x\right), if |y|<|x|.

The function U\left(a,b,x+y\right) has the following expansions: \sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{{\left(a\right)_{n}}(-y)^{n}}{n!}U\left(a+n,b+n,x \right), if |y|<|x|, \left(\frac{x+y}{x}\right)^{1-b}\*\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{{\left(1+a-b\right) _{n}}(-\ifrac{y}{x})^{n}}{n!}U\left(a,b-n,x\right), if |y|<|x|, \left(\frac{x}{x+y}\right)^{a}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{{\left(a\right)_{n}}{ \left(1+a-b\right)_{n}}y^{n}}{n!(x+y)^{n}}U\left(a+n,b,x\right), if \Re(y/x)>-\tfrac{1}{2}, e^{y}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-y)^{n}}{n!}U\left(a,b+n,x\right), if |y|<|x|, e^{y}\left(\frac{x}{x+y}\right)^{b-a}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-y)^{n}}{n!(x+y )^{n}}U\left(a-n,b,x\right), if \Re(y/x)>-\tfrac{1}{2}, e^{y}\left(\frac{x+y}{x}\right)^{1-b}\sum_{n=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-y)^{n}}{n!x^{n }}U\left(a-n,b-n,x\right), if |y|<|x|.
To obtain similar expansions for M\left(a,b,xy\right) and U\left(a,b,xy\right) , replace y in the previous two subsections by (y-1)x.
